item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.

item.description: Culture editor Sia Michel told staff about the changes Tuesday.

item.title: Broadway Box Office: Sadie Sink Departs ‘John Proctor,’ ‘Boop’ Sees Closing Boost
item.description: ‘John Proctor Is the Villain’ hit $1.1 million as Sadie Sink finished her Tony-nominated run.

item.title: Tech Billionaires Back Erebor in the Wake of Silicon Valley Bank Collapse
item.description: Funded by Anduril cofounder Palmer Luckey and Palantir cofounder Joe Lonsdale, the new bank—named, like their companies, after Tolkien lore—aims to serve startups in crypto, AI, and defense.

item.title: Tech Billionaires Back Erebor in the Wake of Silicon Valley Bank Collapse
item.description: Funded by Anduril cofounder Palmer Luckey and Palantir cofounder Joe Lonsdale, the new bank—named, like their companies, after Tolkien lore—aims to serve startups in crypto, AI, and defense.

item.title: Nick Cannon to Launch Podcast Giving Relationship Advice

item.title: Prosecutors Push For Prison For Talent Agency Chief Alleged to Have Stolen Millions From Clients
item.description: Mark Measures, owner and president of talent agency KMR, is alleged to have stolen $1.8 million from New York actors, and money from employees.

item.description: Mark Measures, owner and president of talent agency KMR, is alleged to have stolen $1.8 million from New York actors, and money from employees.

item.title: SiriusXM Launches Lower Cost Ad-Supported Plan in Bid to Take on Streaming Audio Giants
item.description: SiriusXM Play will cost under $7 and have an ad load that is about half of terrestrial radio stations.

item.title: ‘Bluey,’ BritBox International Help BBC Commercial Hit Record Revenue
item.description: “The investments made in previous years, together with a diversified portfolio, are delivering a trajectory of sustainable growth, despite ongoing global macroeconomic and geopolitical uncertainty.”

item.title: ‘Saturday Night Live’ Visual Effects Workers Ratify First Union Contract
item.description: IATSE members unanimously voted to greenlight the deal, which includes AI language and “kill fees” for workers whose projects are canceled.

item.title: Santa Fe Studios Film Campus Up for Sale
item.description: The 65-acre, 79,550-square-foot complex, which has hosted shoots from Netflix, Warner Bros., 20th Century and more, includes two soundstages.

item.description: The 65-acre, 79,550-square-foot complex, which has hosted shoots from Netflix, Warner Bros., 20th Century and more, includes two soundstages.

item.title: TelevisaUnivision Expects Lower Quarterly Revenue Amid Advertising Pinch
item.description: The Spanish-language media company has also proposed a $1 billion debt issue by a subsidiary with an eye to refinancing senior notes due in 2027.

item.description: The Spanish-language media company has also proposed a $1 billion debt issue by a subsidiary with an eye to refinancing senior notes due in 2027.

item.title: These 33 Sports Super-Lawyers Will Slam-Dunk Your Deals
item.description: A-list athletes like Patrick Mahomes and teams like the L.A. Lakers turn to these attorneys when they’re being signed, in hot water (ask Shohei Ohtani) or want to score an eight-figure deal with ESPN.

item.title: These 33 Sports Super-Lawyers Will Slam-Dunk Your Deals
item.description: A-list athletes like Patrick Mahomes and teams like the L.A. Lakers turn to these attorneys when they’re being signed, in hot water (ask Shohei Ohtani) or want to score an eight-figure deal with ESPN.

item.title: Sesame Workshop Says Elmo’s X Account Has Been “Secured” After Hack
item.description: The official Elmo X account posted bizarre and offensive comments over the weekend.

item.title: Podcast Company Kaleidoscope Raises $5 Million For New Shows As It Eyes Film, TV Deals (Exclusive)
item.description: German publisher Hubert Burda Media and North Base Media led the Series A raise, joined by other media heavyweights like ex-Viacom CEO Tom Freston and The Raine Group.

item.title: Podcast Company Kaleidoscope Raises $5 Million For New Shows As It Eyes Film, TV Deals (Exclusive)
item.description: German publisher Hubert Burda Media and North Base Media led the Series A raise, joined by other media heavyweights like ex-Viacom CEO Tom Freston and The Raine Group.

item.title: Sean Hannity Sets ‘Wanted’ Series at Fox Nation as Streamer Goes West (Exclusive)
item.description: Hannity will front ‘Wanted: Dead or Alive,’ a new series that joins a growing lineup of Western-themed programming at the Fox News streaming service.

item.title: Sean Hannity Sets ‘Wanted’ Series at Fox Nation as Streamer Goes West (Exclusive)
item.description: Hannity will front ‘Wanted: Dead or Alive,’ a new series that joins a growing lineup of Western-themed programming at the Fox News streaming service.

item.title: Dr. Phil Returns: Launches Envoy Media Co. in Comeback Bid
item.description: The new venture will combine news, entertainment, and “citizen journalism” in an app, just weeks after his Merit Street Media filed for bankruptcy.

item.title: Dr. Phil Returns: Launches Envoy Media Co. in Comeback Bid
item.description: The new venture will combine news, entertainment, and “citizen journalism” in an app, just weeks after his Merit Street Media filed for bankruptcy.

item.title: ABC News to Launch Exclusive Daily Show on Disney+
item.description: ‘What You Need to Know’ will go live on the Disney streaming platform weekdays at 6 a.m., anchored by chief international correspondent James Longman and senior political correspondent Rachel Scott.

item.title: ABC News to Launch Exclusive Daily Show on Disney+
item.description: ‘What You Need to Know’ will go live on the Disney streaming platform weekdays at 6 a.m., anchored by chief international correspondent James Longman and senior political correspondent Rachel Scott.

item.title: Sean Astin to Run for SAG-AFTRA President, Fran Drescher a Question Mark for Another Bid (Exclusive)
item.description: The ‘Lord of the Rings’ star will be campaigning alongside secretary-treasurer hopeful Michelle Hurd and Joely Fisher, who is targeting L.A. Local president.

item.title: Creator Maris Jones Signs With CAA (Exclusive)
item.description: The digital artist and director is known for camp “mini-movies” inspired by pop culture and a retro-fantasy aesthetic that caught the attention of major brands like Apple, YouTube and Netflix.

item.description: The digital artist and director is known for camp “mini-movies” inspired by pop culture and a retro-fantasy aesthetic that caught the attention of major brands like Apple, YouTube and Netflix.

item.title: David Ellison’s Skydance Has Held Talks to Buy Bari Weiss’ The Free Press (Report)
item.description: The mogul is in early discussions about an acquisition of the site, which has positioned itself outside of the mainstream media world, The New York Times reported.

item.title: David Ellison’s Skydance Has Held Talks to Buy Bari Weiss’ The Free Press (Report)
item.description: The mogul is in early discussions about an acquisition of the site, which has positioned itself outside of the mainstream media world, The New York Times reported.

item.title: Join Our Livestream: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? Subscribers can join WIRED live on July 16 as we answer your questions about this critical topic.

item.title: AMC Theatres Gets Stock Upgrade on Outlook of “More Consistent” Blockbuster Releases
item.description: Stock in the mega-exhibitor soared on Friday as a Wedbush analyst argued glaring uncertainties brought on by the pandemic and the Hollywood strikes is behind the debt-laden company.

item.description: Stock in the mega-exhibitor soared on Friday as a Wedbush analyst argued glaring uncertainties brought on by the pandemic and the Hollywood strikes is behind the debt-laden company.

item.title: Creator Eric Sedeno Signs With UTA (Exclusive)
item.description: The influencer has parlayed comic TikTok and Instagram videos into a solid online following, brand collaborations and a platform to discuss LGBTQ+ issues.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.

item.title: Tornado Cash Made Crypto Anonymous. Now One of Its Creators Faces Trial
item.description: Roman Storm, one of the developers of crypto-anonymizing tool Tornado Cash, will stand trial in New York starting July 14. His supporters claim the freedom to develop software is under threat.

item.title: Tornado Cash Made Crypto Anonymous. Now One of Its Creators Faces Trial
item.description: Roman Storm, one of the developers of crypto-anonymizing tool Tornado Cash, will stand trial in New York starting July 14. His supporters claim the freedom to develop software is under threat.
